osgART::VideoLoadModel

osgART::VideoLoadModel Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for osgART::VideoLoadModel:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

PRE-CONDITION: user need to be sure the correct texture coordinate are present on the file. REM: just work with basic texture type, not texture rectangle.
